channel.title: Demos on 9th lvl Truestrike
channel.description: Recent content in Demos on 9th lvl Truestrike

item.title: Crate Trimmer Algorithm
item.description: What is the most efficient width a container can pack it’s elements under the constraints that… Elements are atomic Elements retain their order Container height is immutable Algorithms under these conditions have the strong possibility of being greedy. Reasoned since the first obvious, though aproximal solution, is to do a binary search between the non-atomic optimal width and the given container width with a non-decimal delta threshold (1px).

item.title: Drifting Card Algorithm
item.description: -- .entry-content::after { /* keep floating content in flow, have div respond */ content: ""; clear: both; display: table; } #demo { display: inline; float: right; } Aim: To have cards drift to a predefined grid point while under the criteria of: Have no crossing paths --
